infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to your health data to track your fitness progress, workouts, and provide personalized insights.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app needs permission to update your health data to record workouts and fitness activities.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to fitness devices like Apple Watch, heart rate monitors, and other health sensors.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to communicate with fitness devices and health sensors.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to track your outdoor activities and workouts.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion data to track your steps, workouts, and physical activity.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan nutrition labels and take progress photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save and view progress photos.

plugins.motionPermission: Allow FitJourney Tracker to access motion and fitness data to track your activities and workouts.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow FitJourney Tracker to use your location to track outdoor workouts and activities.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow FitJourney Tracker to access your camera to scan nutrition labels and take progress photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow FitJourney Tracker to access your photos to save and view progress photos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow FitJourney Tracker to save photos to your library.
